Port Not Accessible

Your port cannot be reached from the internet. Other nodes won't be able to connect to you.

To fix this:

  1. Open your router settings - Usually at 192.168.1.1
  2. Find Port Forwarding - Look in NAT, Gaming, or Advanced
  3. Add a rule: External 20049 → Internal 20049 (UDP)
  4. Check firewall - Allow incoming connections on port 20049

Important: Forward UDP, not TCP. QUIC uses UDP.
